select * from (select f.*,decode(f.project_type,'pfr','正式评审','pre','投标评审','bulletin','其他评审') PROJECTTYPE,( select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.UUID = f.createby ) CREATEBYNAME, ( select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.UUID = f.REVIEWPERSON_ID ) REVIEWPERSONNAME, ( select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = f.pertainarea_id ) PERTAINAREANAME from ( select pp.*,pp.project_name pname from rcm_v_project_info pp where pp.project_type in ('pfr','pre') and pp.stage in (3,3.5,3.7,3.9,4,5,6,7,9) and pp.wf_state in ('1','2')
union select b.*,b.project_name pname from rcm_v_project_info b where b.project_type in ('bulletin') and b.stage in (1.5,2,3,4,5,6) and b.wf_state in ('1','2') ) f) ta where 1 = 1 and ta.project_name like '%${projectName}%' and ta.project_type = #{type} and ( ta.project_type in ('pfr','pre') and ta.stage in (${pfrStage}) or ta.project_type in ('bulletin') and ta.stage in (${bulletinStage}) ) and ta.meeting_time >= to_date(#{now},'yyyy-MM-dd')

select * from ( SELECT RFI.ID, RFI.BUSINESSID, RFI.PROJECTNAME, RFI.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = RFI.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, RFI.PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = RFI.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = RFI.REVIEWPERSONID) REVIEWPERSONNAME, RFI.ISURGENT, RFR.CREATE_DATE, RFR.CONTROLLER_VAL FROM RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_INFO RFI, RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_REPORT RFR WHERE RFI.STAGE = 3 AND RFI.WF_STATE IN ('1', '2') AND RFI.BUSINESSID = RFR.BUSINESSID AND RFR.CREATE_DATE IS NOT NULL and RFI.REVIEWPERSONID=#{psfzr} ) t where 1 = 1 and t.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%' and t.createby like '%${createBy}%' and t.pertainareaName like '%${pertainareaname}%' order by ${orderBy}

select t.* from (SELECT RFI.ID, RFI.BUSINESSID, RFI.PROJECTNAME, RFI.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = RFI.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, (SELECT su.NAME FROM Sys_User su WHERE su.uuid = rfi.reviewpersonid) reviewpersonname, RFI.PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = RFI.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, RFI.WF_STATE, RFR.CREATE_DATE , RFR.CONTROLLER_VAL FROM RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_INFO RFI, RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_REPORT RFR WHERE RFI.STAGE in ('3.7','3.5','3.9','4','5','6','7','9') AND RFI.wf_state = '2' AND RFR.BUSINESSID = RFI.BUSINESSID and RFI.REVIEWPERSONID=#{psfzr} ) t where 1 = 1 and t.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%' and t.createby like '%${createBy}%' and t.pertainareaName like '%${pertainareaname}%' order by ${orderBy}

mapper.select: SELECT AC.PROC_INST_ID_, AC.PROC_DEF_ID_, AC.BUSINESS_KEY_, TASK.TASK_NAME, TASK.TASK_ID, TASK.PROC_INST_ID_, RFI.BUSINESSID FROM (SELECT A.PROC_INST_ID_, A.PROC_DEF_ID_, A.BUSINESS_KEY_ FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A) AC, (SELECT LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(T.NAME_), ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.PROC_INST_ID_) AS TASK_NAME, LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(T.ID_), ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.ID_) AS TASK_ID, T.PROC_INST_ID_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK T GROUP BY T.PROC_INST_ID_) TASK, RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_INFO RFI WHERE RFI.BUSINESSID = AC.BUSINESS_KEY_(+) AND AC.PROC_INST_ID_ = TASK.PROC_INST_ID_(+) AND RFI.BUSINESSID = #{businessId}
